messages.content: I'm giving you a title and sub-title from AppSumo. I want you to pull out the product name and get rid of othe supporting text. Do not output any other text other than the title or name of the AppSumo product. Use this text: {{1.title}}

__IMTCONN__.label: Andy's Personal Open AI API Key

parameters.name: handleErrors

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

messages.content:
You are a Youtube shorts script writer. I want you to take the following article and turn it into a script that is between 40 and 50 seconds in length. Do not output any other text or special characters. Narration ideas or points or B roll only output the text of the script and nothing else.

{{stripHTML(substring(2.data; indexOf(2.data; "<article"); indexOf(2.data; "</article>")))}}

Rules:
1) The scripit must not be longer than 50 seconds.

__IMTCONN__.label: Andy's Personal Open AI API Key

messages.content:
You are an expert Pexels.com stock video search assistant. Take the following script, and a query of a few words to find a stock video that will be used as the background for this video script. Be creative.

In your prompt define the people that should be in the video, the setting, and the action the people should be doing. 

Here is the script: {{3.result}}

Rules:
1) Do not surround the query in quotes.
2) Do not include an extra characters or text.
3) All queries should include an office, professional, or other qualifier to ensure results are professional and related to software, entreprenuers or small business.

__IMTCONN__.label: Andy's Personal Open AI API Key
